column2: HUYA, Inc. is a holding company, which engages in the development of game live streaming platform. The company is headquartered in Guangzhou, Guangdong and currently employs 1,253 full-time employees. The firm cooperates with e-sports event organizers, as well as game developers and publishers. Its game contents include gameplay, e-sports tournament events and other e-sports game shows. The firm also develops and operates certain mobile games jointly with third-party distribution platforms, and game-related apps. The firm's content offers other entertainment genres, such as talent shows, anime and outdoor activities. As of December 31, 2018, The Company's live streaming content covered over 3,300 games.
Building A3, E-Park,280 Hanxi Road, Panyu District
